game.name: Pathologic 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Pathologic 2 is a groundbreaking open-world horror RPG. Resist the plague. Make medicine. Heal people. Perform an autopsy. Trade to get what you need. Fight and kill if necessary. Survive. Struggle with an outbreak in a secluded rural town that is rapidly turning into hell.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pathologic 2 is a groundbreaking open-world horror RPG. Resist the plague. Make medicine. Heal people. Perform an autopsy. Trade to get what you need. Fight and kill if necessary. Survive. Struggle with an outbreak in a secluded rural town that is rapidly turning into hell.

reviewHighlights.text: 돈도 없고 시간도 없고 먹을것도 없습니다. 40번쯤 죽은뒤에 결국 콘솔 치트로 엔딩 봤네요.. 난이도를 최하로 해도 어렵습니다. 근데 쉬워지는 순간 본질에서 벗어나니 그게 맞는것같습니다. 스토리와 설정이 매력있으니 도전해보고싶으면 추천드립니다.
